Package org.fosstrak.webadapters.epcis.logic

Class Summary
AbstractBusinessLogic Class containing helper methods to initialize the Resources.
AbstractEventBusinessLogic Class containing Helper Methods.
AbstractEventFinderBusinessLogic Class containing methods to fetch the EPCIS for events, locations, readers and times
AbstractQueryParamBusinessLogic Method to handle the query params
CaptureBusinessLogic This class is a simulator that can be used to capture events, i.e. to send them to the EPCIS capture interface.
Initializer Class containing static methods used for the initialization of the logic
QueryBusinessLogic Business logic for the Query
RESTfulEPCISBusinessLogic Business logic for the EPCIS Webadapter Root
SubscriptionBusinessLogic Business logic for the subscription
